106765.「聞きましたよ カンダタ子分Ａさん！\n カンダタ親分さんと 月世界へ\n 悪者:
I thought it was you, Merry Man A! I hear that
you and Mr. Robbin' 'Ood are headed to the
moon to get rid of those bad fellows!

106766.「子分Ｂの私も お手伝いしたいのですが\n あいにく 生まれてこのかた 無職でし:
As Merry Man B, I would love to help, but
sadly I have been unemployed all my life. I
do not know a single skill nor spell...

106767.「ですが おふたりのご活躍を ここで\n ひたすらに 祈ってますよ！\n ささっ:
Instead, I'll just stay here and wish you two
the best of luck! Go on, go on! The Big Horn's
waiting!

106768.「いってらっしゃい カンダタ子分Ａさん！: See you soon, Merry Man A!

106769.なんと <pc>は 月に到着した！:
<pc> has successfully landed on the
moon!

106770.「カグヤ＝ムーン様が おそれていた通り\n 侵略者の王が ふたたび 大船団を率い:
It's just as Mistress Moon feared...the
invaders' king has invaded us once more
with such a large fleet...

106771.「今度こそ 降伏せよと命じる侵略者に\n 姫様は 救世主カンダタ様がいる限り\n:
When they ordered her to surrender, she resisted, saying that the moon would not be destroyed so long as she had her savior,
Robbin' 'Ood...

106772.「それに 腹を立てた 侵略者の王\n リルグレイドは 我らが姫様を\n やつらの:
Their king, named Lil' Gray, was so offended
that he took her to his mothership!

106774.「カグヤから預かった ヘンテコな首飾りで\n あいつ 俺様に 助けを求めてきてな:
She was in a right pickle an' asked me fer help with the necklace she gave me. I rushed 'ere as fast I could, an' now I'm not even
sure what I'm lookin' at!

106775.「これも 子分のテメーが\n しっかり 月を見張ってねえからだ！\n どうしてく:
And it's all YER fault 'cuz you didn't keep
an' eye on the moon! Well? How ya plannin'
on fixin' this?!

106776.「カンダタ様。どうか 気をお静めください。\n 今は 姫様をお助けするのが 先決:
Mr. Robbin' 'Ood, please calm down. We have
to focus on saving her!

106777.「あなた様に授けられた 首飾りで\n どうか 囚われの姫に\n ご連絡を とって:
Could you please use the necklace she gave
you to contact her?

106779.「おいっ カグヤ！\n カンダタ様が 月まで来てやったぞ！\n 返事をしやがれい:
Oi, Mistress! The great Robbin' 'Ood is 'ere
on the moon now. Answer me, won't ya?

106780.カグヤの首飾りから 声が聞こえてくる……。: A faint voice was coming from the necklace...

106781.「おお……その うるわしき声は カンダタ様。\n はるばる 月まで おいでくださ:
Ooh...that boisterous voice could only mean
Robbin' 'Ood. I'm so grateful that you came
all the way back to the moon...

106782.「姫様！ おケガは ございませぬか！？: Mistress! You're not hurt, are you?!

106783.「わらわは 大事ありませぬ。\n されど 侵略者の王に 月の秘宝をよこせ。\n:
You mustn't worry about me. But you must give
the Treasure of the Moon to their king, lest
he will destroy the moon...

106784.「なんだとお！？\n 月の秘宝は 俺様のモンだ！\n どこのどいつか知らねえが:
Wuzzat now?! That treasure is MINE, ya 'ear
me?! I don't care who you are, but yer
spoilin' for a thrashin'!

106785.「カンダタ様……なんと頼もしきお言葉。 \n やはり あなた様こそ 伝説の救世主:
Robbin' 'Ood...how encouraging your words are.
You are the legendary savior, after all...

106786.「んなこたぁ どうでもいいんだ！\n どうやって そこに殴り込みゃいいんだ！？\:
I don't care 'bout none o' that! Just tell me
'ow in the 'eck I'm s'posed to get up there!

106787.「どうか お鎮まりくだされ カンダタ様。\n わらわが 囚われている 侵略者の母:
Please calm yourself, Robbin' 'Ood. As you can
see above, the mothership where they have
captured me is hovering above the palace.

106788.「侵略者たちなら いざしらず\n 我ら 月の民には 母船まで飛ぶことは\n とう:
While it is possible for the invaders to do
so, we denizens of the moon cannot fly...

106789.「じゃあ あきらめろってぇのか！\n 俺様の月の秘宝を どうしてくれる！！:
So, we should just sit 'ere and twiddle our
thumbs, then?! What about the treasure?!?

106790.「……ひとつだけ 方法があるやもしれませぬ。: There may be one way you can...

106791.「太古の昔……こたびと 同様に\n 侵略者たちが 月へと 襲いきた時\n 伝説の:
Long, long ago, during ancient times...when
the invaders attacked us, the legendary savior
of the moon used a divine object.

106792.「ひとけりで 空の彼方まで 駆ける\n あの 空とぶくつが あれば……。:
If only we still had those Skysoar Shoes, then
you could fly through the sky with ease...

106793.「空とぶくつ……だと？ \n なんだぁ？ どっかで 聞いたような……。:
Skysoar... Shoes? Ya know... I fink I 'eard
that name somewhere before...

106794.「かつての救世主様は 空とぶくつにて\n 侵略者の宇宙船へ 乗り込み\n きゃつ:
The former savior used those shoes to board
the invaders' mothership, ultimately driving
them away.

106795.「伝説の救世主 ジンダタ様の神具 \n 空とぶくつならば この宇宙船までも\n:
If only we had the Skysoar Shoes of the
legendary savior Robbert Hoodlum, then
you could fly up to the ship...

106796.「ジンダタだとっ！？\n そりゃあ 俺様の ご先祖様の名前だぜ！:
Did ya just say Robbert 'oodlum?! That's the
name of me ancestor!

106798.「おう 間違いねえぜ。\n 月と俺様の間にゃあ ずいぶんと\n おかしな因縁が:
There ain't no doubt about it. Guess I got
some kind o' weird connection wiv this
moon.

106799.「ご先祖様は 自分の墓に お宝を遺したと \n 代々 伝えられてる。\n きっと:
My ancestors left behind a treasure in their
graves, and kept passin' it down. That's
gotta be those Skysoar Shoes.

106800.「おいっ <pc>！\n テメーは 今すぐ ご先祖様の墓へ行き\n 空とぶくつを:
Oi, <pc>! Git yer behind to my
ancestor's grave right now and get
those shoes!

106801.「俺様の先祖 ジンダタの墓は\n プクランド大陸 キラキラ大風車塔 入口そばの\:
His grave should be on the riverbank near the
entrance to that big ol' windmill in Pukuland.

106802.「俺様は テメーが戻ってくるまで\n 昼寝……いや 英気を養っておく。\n いい:
I fink I'll just wait here and take a nap...
I mean, recharge meself until ya get back.
Now go an' find those shoes!

106803.「<pc>様……お願いいたします。\n どうか 救世主カンダタ様のため\n 空と:
<pc>... You must find the Skysoar
Shoes so that our savior Robbin' 'Ood
can fly!

106804.「おや カンダタ子分Ａさん！\n とっくに 月へ向かったと思っていましたが\n:
Oh, Merry Man A! I thought you'd already left
for the moon. Did you forget something?

106805.「ささっ。どうぞ ビッグホルンへ！: Go on, go on! The Big Horn is waiting!

106806.「いってらっしゃい カンダタ子分Ａさん！: See you soon, Merry Man A!

106807.なんと <pc>は 月に到着した！:
<pc> has successfully landed on the
moon!

106808.「救世主 カンダタ様！\n あなたの従者 <cs_pchero>様が\n ようや:
Savior Robbin' 'Ood! Your servant has finally
returned!

106809.「よーし <cs_pchero>。\n 今度こそ あの 胸クソ悪い\n ドロドロ:
Awright, <cs_pchero>. This time we're
gonna beat that slimy lowlife ta bits!

106811.カンダタは 空とぶくつを はいた！: Robbin' 'Ood puts on the Skysoar Shoes!

106812.「いてて……。\n こりゃあ どこに着いたんだ？:
Ouch, that'll leave a mark...
Where'd we end up, anyhow?

106814.「そなたの言いなりになど ならぬぞ。\n 侵略者の王 リルグレイド！: I will not give in to your demands, Lil' Gray!

106815.「きっと 伝承どおり 救世主様が\n わらわを 助けに来てくださるはず！\n さ:
As the legends say the savior will surely come
to rescue me! That is when you will meet your
end!

106816.「……愚カナ。８７６１２７３時間前\n 我々ヲ撃退シタ 野蛮人ナラバ\n スデニ:
HOW FOOLISH. THE SAVAGE WE REPELLED
8,761,273 HOURS AGO HAS ALREADY BEEN CONFIRMED
TO BE DECEASED.

106817.「降伏セヨ カグヤ＝ムーン。\n 助ケガ 来ル確率ハ\n ０.０００３ぱーせんと:
SURRENDER, MISTRESS MOON. YOUR PROBABILITY
OF BEING SAVED IS 0.0003 PERCENT...

106818.「愚か者は そなたじゃぞ！\n リルグレイドっ！！:
It seems it is YOU who is the fool,
Lil' Gray!!

106820.「侵入者……？\n ドウシテ 野蛮人ガ コノ母船ニ。\n せきゅりてぃ・えらー:
INTRUDERS...? THERE ARE SAVAGES ON MY
MOTHERSHIP. IS THERE A SECURITY ERROR...?

106821.「つべこべ うるせえんだよ！: Ya should close that big mouth of yers!

106822.「いいか！ 月の秘宝は 俺様のモンだ。\n 邪魔するヤツは ぶっとばす！\n …:
Ya better listen, and listen good! That Treasure o' the Moon's mine, an' anyone who gets in me way's askin' for a right
beatin'! Let's get 'em, !

106823.「……優先順位 変更。 \n 侵入者ノ 排除ヲ 執行スル！！:
CHANGE IN PRIORITY...
ENFORCING IMMEDIATE ELIMINATION OF THE
INTRUDERS!!

106824.「おお……カンダタ様！\n きっと また来てくださると\n わらわは 信じており:
Oh, my savior...! I just knew that you'd come
for me again!

106825.「再ビ 戦イヲ挑ンダトコロデ\n 勝利ノ確率ハ 変化シナイ。\n 野蛮人ノ 知能:
TRY AS YOU MAY TO FIGHT ME AGAIN, BUT YOUR CHANCES OF SUCCESS REMAIN UNCHANGED. DATA SHOWS YOU SAVAGES ARE MUCH LESS
INTELLIGENT THAN I.

106826.「へっ。ごたくを 並べやがって。\n 今度こそ 勝つのは 俺様だ！\n ……いく:
Hah! Spoutin' a load of rubbish, ain't ya?
This time, we're gonna win for sure!
Let's get 'em, <cs_pchero>!!

106827.「最優先事項。\n 侵入者ノ 排除ヲ 執行スル！！:
TOP PRIORITY: INTRUDERS ARE TO BE ELIMINATED
IMMEDIATELY!!

106828.「アリエ…ナイ……。\n 野蛮人……８７６１２７３時間ノ 間ニ\n ココマデ 進:
IM...POSSIBLE... THIS SAVAGE HAS EVOLVED TO
THIS CAPACITY IN THE SPAN OF 8,761,273
HOURS...?

106829.「どうでい！\n 俺様の強さを 思い知ったか！:
How 'bout that?!
Realized the strength I got now, eh?!

106831.「あらーと。 \n 管理者ノ 心音停止二ヨリ\n 自爆装置ヲ 起動スル。総員 退:
ALERT! ADMINISTRATOR'S HEARTBEAT HAS CEASED
FUNCTION. SELF-DESTRUCT SEQUENCE ACTIVATED.
ALL PERSONNEL SHOULD EVACUATE IMMEDIATELY.

106835.「おう！ <pc>っ！！\n テメーも 無事だったようだな。:
Oh, <pc>!! Looks like ya made it
out okay.

106837.「こたびは 月の民のために\n 悪しき侵略者どもを 退治いただき\n まことに:
On behalf of all of us here who dwell on this
moon, I thank you from the bottom of my heart
for putting a stop to those wicked invaders.

106838.「へっ。あの程度のヤロー\n 俺様と <pc>にかかれば\n 朝メシ前だぜ！:
Hah! Blokes like them don't stand a chance
if me and <pc> are around to give
'em a good thrashin'!

106839.「おたわむれを。\n 救世主カンダタ様の おチカラなくば\n 月は 今ごろ 滅び:
There's no need to be so humble. Without the
savior's power, the moon would have already
faced its destruction.

106840.「ああ もう わかったわかった！\n なんでもいいから\n とっとと 約束のアレ:
Awright, I got it, I got it! Now 'urry up and
give me that thing ya promised!

106842.「これこそが 月の秘宝……。\n 所有する者に 不老不死のチカラを与える\n 神:
This is the Treasure of the Moon...
It is a mysterious tree that grants its holder
the power of immortality.

106843.「王宮に祀られた この樹が \n 光輝いている間だけ 我等 月の民は\n 老いや:
Only when this tree shines brightly can our
people be protected from old age and
disease...

106845.「救世主カンダタ様。\n 月の秘宝……いえ 月のすべてを\n あなた様に 差し上:
Robbin' 'Ood, savior of this world...
I bestow upon you the Treasure of the
Moon...no, the entirety of the moon itself.

106847.「……カンダタ様。\n どうか わらわの夫となり\n 月世界を 治めてはください:
Robbin' 'Ood, please... Would you take my hand
as your wife, and rule over the moon by my
side?

106849.「あなた様の強さ そして 優しさに\n わらわの心は 奪われてしまいました。\n:
Your strength and your kindness have
captivated my heart. I beg of you...
Please stay here with me...

106852.「月のすべてってのは 魅力的だが \n 俺様にゃあ 世界の１００大秘宝を全部まる:
The whole moon is a temptin' offer, but I got
bigger dreams! I wanna find the 'undred
greatest treasures all over the world!

106853.「こんなトコで モタモタしてらんねえぜ。\n そんじゃあ あばよ。:
I don't have time to be dawdlin' 'round 'ere.
Well then, cheers!

106854.「で……では\n せめて 月の秘宝だけでも\n お持ちくだされ！:
W...well, then at least take the Treasure of
the Moon with you!

106855.「死なねえカラダになったら \n 盗みのスリルが 味わえねえじゃねーか。:
If this body o' mine can't hit the bucket,
then there ain't no thrill to stealin'
anythin' anymore.

106856.「生きるか死ぬかの 大勝負に勝って \n 見たこともないような お宝を手に入れる:
Winnin' the game of life or death while
nabbin' treasures no one's ever seen before...
That's wot a great thief like me lives for!

106858.「ま ヨボヨボの ジジイになって \n 隠居したくなったら オメーに世話になるぜ:
When I become a wobbly ol' geezer and fancy
retirin', I'll be relyin' on you, lass. Until
then, I'll leave the treasure 'ere!

106860.「わらわは この月より…… \n あなた様の おかえりを\n いつまでも お待ち:
I will patiently wait on this moon for your
return. No matter how long it may take...

106861.「おう。そん時は よろしくな！: O' course. I'll see ya then!

106862.「よーし！ めでたく 月の秘宝も\n 俺様のモンに なったし\n 地上へ戻るぞ！:
Awright! Now that I've finally found the
treasure, it's time to be headin' home!

106865.「おかえりなさい カンダタ子分Ａさん！\n おふたりとも ご無事で何よりです！:
Welcome back, the two of you! I'm so glad that
you are safe!

106866.「<pc>。俺様のために\n よく 働いてくれたな。\n さすがは 最強の子分だ:
Ya really pulled through fer me back there,
<pc>. Yer the best Merry Man
I ever did have!

106867.「ほれっ。侵略者のヤローの 船から\n こっそり盗んできた お宝だ。\n 今回の:
'ere, I want ya to have this. I secretly
nabbed it while we were on that ship!

106868.「ふ～っ。しかし 月の秘宝を手に入れるのは \n なかなか 骨の折れる仕事だった:
Phew...getting a hold of that treasure was
quite the tough gig. I reckon I'll just take
it easy for a while.

106869.「また 新しいお宝を 奪いにいく時は \n テメーにも 働いてもらう！\n それ:
An' when it's time to find a new treasure,
yer gonna 'elp me then, too! By then, you'll
really be packin' the punches!

106870.「カンダタ親分さん！\n 子分Ｂの私に お駄賃は ないんですか！？:
Mr. Robbin' 'Ood! Doesn't your Merry Man B
get something, too?!

106871.「ん？ 悪ぃ悪ぃ。すっかり 忘れてたぜ！\n そのへんで なにかしら みつくろっ:
Eh? My bad, completely forgot! I'll sort
somethin' out around here, and I'll give
it to ya. Just follow me!

106873.「……しかし 初めて会った時は 敵だった\n テメーが 俺様の右ウデになるとは\:
...When we first met, we were enemies. Now
you've become my right-'and mate.
It's a strange thing, ain't it, <pc>?

107691.「救世主 カンダタ様！\n あなたの従者 <cs_pchero>様が\n 空とぶ:
Savior Robbin' 'Ood! Your servant has
returned with the Skysoar Shoes in tow!

107693.「まずは 空とぶくつを\n こっちに もらうぜ。いいな？<yesno><clos:
Now then, hand over those shoes, awright?
<yesno><close>

107694.「ふざけてる場合じゃねえ！\n 早く 空とぶくつを よこせってんだ！\n な！:
Not the time for a laugh, mate! Now 'and
over the shoes already!<yesno><close>

107696.「ほう……。\n これが ご先祖様が 使ったっていう\n 空とぶくつか。えらく:
Blimey...these 'ere's supposed to be the
flyin' shoes my ancestor used? Look proper
knackered, they do.

107697.「まあいい。\n さっそく 侵略者のトコに 殴り込むぞ！\n 俺様に つかまれ！:
Well, that's fine. We got some invaders to
clobber! Hang onto me tight!

107698.<cs_pchero>は カンダタのマントのすそを\nしっかり つかんだ。:
<cs_pchero> firmly grasps the end of
Robbin' 'Ood's cloak.

107700.カンダタは 空とぶくつを はいた！: Robbin' 'Ood puts on the Skysoar Shoes!

107701.「おふたりとも お気を付けて！ \n どうか 姫様を お救いくださいまし！！:
Please be careful, both of you!
You must save her!!

107702.「原住民ノ 支配者 カグヤ＝ムーン。\n 月ノ秘宝ヲ 渡スカ 星ゴト滅ブカ。\n:
MISTRESS MOON, RULER OF THE NATIVE POPULATION. GIVE TO ME THE TREASURE OF THE MOON, OR ELSE THIS PLANET WILL FACE DESTRUCTION. THE CHOICE
IS YOURS TO MAKE.

114852.なんと <cs_pchero>と カンダタは\n侵略者の母船の 外壁に到着した！:
Suddenly, <cs_pchero> and Robbin' 'Ood
land on the outer hull of the invaders'
mothership!

114853.「なんだ。こりゃあ 宇宙船の外じゃねえか！\n どうやって 中に入るんでい。:
Blimey! This is the outside o' the ship. How
in blazes are we s'posed to get inside?

114854.「ええい 硬い壁だな。\n コノヤロ 開けっ！ 開かねえか！！\n どりゃーーー:
This hull's pretty tough. Open up, ya blasted
wall! Graaahhh!!

114855.なんと カンダタは 外壁をけやぶり\n勢いあまって <cs_pchero>を道連:
In a fit of rage, Robbin' 'Ood shatters the
hull, falling inside the mothership along
with <cs_pchero>!

114857.「カグヤは 俺様にまかせろ。\n 月世界の王宮で おちあおうぜ！\n <cs_p:
I'll take care o' Mistress here. We'll meet
back inside o' the palace!

114859.<cs_pchero>と カンダタは\nバラバラに ふっとばされてしまった……。:
<cs_pchero> and Robbin' 'Ood were both
blown away in separate directions...

114860.「そうそう 空とぶくつの くつ底から\n ご先祖様が遺した 地図が見つかってな…:
Oh yeah! I found a map inside those shoes that
ya gave me. Oops...won't spoil the surprise
for ya. It's somethin' to look forward to!

114861.「世界の１００大……いや ９９大秘宝は\n 俺様とテメーで 全部 手に入れるんだ:
You and me are gonna nab all 'undred...no, all
ninety-nine of the great treasures 'round the
world. Ya'd better tag along!

114862.「じゃあな <pc>。\n 俺様の 最強の子分よ！\n 次の お宝探しまで くた:
See ya 'round, <pc>. My best Merry
Man! Don't go croakin' until the next
next treasure hunt, ya 'ear?

114903.「いってらっしゃい カンダタ子分Ａさん！: See you soon, Merry Man A!

114904.なんと <pc>は 月に到着した！:
<pc> has successfully landed on the
moon!
